Html:
I'm planning to use your JQueryXrmDependentOptionSet extension function for a dependent option set field requirement that am currently working on.

My question is does this save the dependent option set values to database and will I be able to save the record with the value selected in the dependent option set and can view the saved value once I retrieve the record?

Hi There.

JQueryXrmDependentOptionSet function is not about creating the values. It is to 'filter' values dynamically according to another OptionSet value selected, so you will need to create the OptionSet with values first through entity customization.

Jaimie
